snippet: Lighthouse International and Jewish Guild Healthcare, both based in Manhattan, are joining forces to improve advocacy efforts and increase affiliations with similar groups.
abstract: Lighthouse International and Jewish Guild Healthcare are joining forces to improve advocacy efforts and increase affiliations with similar groups; both organizations are based in Manhattan and provide health care and rehabilitation services for blind and visually impaired people; new organization will be known as Lighthouse Guild International.
lead_paragraph: Lighthouse International and Jewish Guild Healthcare, both based in Manhattan, are joining forces to improve advocacy efforts and increase affiliations with similar groups.

headline.main: Hoping to Raise Awareness, 2 Leading Groups for the Blind Plan a Merger
headline.print_headline: Hoping to Raise Awareness, 2 Leading Groups for the Blind Plan a Merger
